name: Techmeme - Simple & Clean with Google News Style
description:
Techmeme facelift with Google News Style.
- Based on Google News style, simple & clean.
- Remove Sponsor Links.
- Works for techmeme.com, techmeme.com/river, techmeme.com/lb, techmeme.com/search
- The screenshot says all: Redesigned Screenshot: http://goo.gl/dDy3i | Original Screenshot: http://goo.gl/NgUiy

Only tested in Google Chrome (Extension - Stylish: http://goo.gl/CwSZZ) & Firefox (Addon - Stylish: http://goo.gl/UjLg3).
Feel free to modify it for your own use.

--
by zonovo
Dec 25, 2010
